# R session information {-}

Details on the R version used for making this book. The source code is available at [`LieberInstitute/VisiumImgProcessing`](https://github.com/LieberInstitute/VisiumImgProcessing).

```{r session_packages, eval = TRUE, message = FALSE}
## Load the package at the top of your script
library("sessioninfo")
```

```{r session_info}
## Reproducibility information

```
